row.process: :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.CTV.NV_UNIT) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &UNIT# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &AKTIV# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &AKTIV# = "J" or "Y" : SET &HND2# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.CTV.NV_DRUKZ) : PROCESS &HND2# : SET &DRUKZ# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,1) : SET &AKTIV# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,2) : IF &AKTIV# = "J" or "Y" : PSET &PA# = "&UNIT#&DRUKZ#" : SET &ALIAS# = "&PA#" : SET &RUN_OBJECT# = "JOBS.CTV.NV_SORT" : INC JOBI.RUN_OBJECT_PASS_VALUES_ALIAS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND2# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
